job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We are looking for an ambitious and skilled Senior Go Engineer to play a key role in the development and delivery of our software products and apps serving over 4m+ users across the globe., As a member of our tech team in Amsterdam, and together with fellow developers, engineers, designers, and product managers, you will contribute to the development of innovative solutions that cater to the requirements of our expanding user community. This empowers users to maximize the benefits derived from our products and services. Additionally, you will have the responsibility of designing and implementing systems that interact with our continuously evolving AI-powered platform, ensuring that what you deliver is scalable, reliable, and secure.
     * Write production-grade product and platform code.
     * Work with a strong agile mindset. Iterate fast and make data-driven decisions.
     * Take responsibility for component technical designs and deliver quality code.
     * Promote feedback and knowledge sharing culture.

   Projects you can look forward to:
     * CF Spark. Our very own Generative AI tool for which customers have already generated over 40+ million images in the last couple of months
     * Launch our Mobile Apps for both iOS and Android platforms.
     * Develop our Community Tools. Kicking this off with our very own AI Chatbot.
job_details.full_text:
Senior Go Engineer

We are looking for an ambitious and skilled Senior Go Engineer to play a key role in the development and delivery of our software products and apps serving over 4m+ users across the globe., As a member of our tech team in Amsterdam, and together with fellow developers, engineers, designers, and product managers, you will contribute to the development of innovative solutions that cater to the requirements of our expanding user community. This empowers users to maximize the benefits derived from our products and services. Additionally, you will have the responsibility of designing and implementing systems that interact with our continuously evolving AI-powered platform, ensuring that what you deliver is scalable, reliable, and secure.
     * Write production-grade product and platform code.
     * Work with a strong agile mindset. Iterate fast and make data-driven decisions.
     * Take responsibility for component technical designs and deliver quality code.
     * Promote feedback and knowledge sharing culture.

   Projects you can look forward to:
     * CF Spark. Our very own Generative AI tool for which customers have already generated over 40+ million images in the last couple of months
     * Launch our Mobile Apps for both iOS and Android platforms.
     * Develop our Community Tools. Kicking this off with our very own AI Chatbot.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on traditional software engineering with Go, and while it mentions interacting with AI-powered platforms and developing an AI Chatbot, it does not detail core AI/ML engineering tasks like model development, fine-tuning, or MLOps specific to AI. The primary focus is on building scalable, reliable, and secure software products.

phrases: play a key role in the development and delivery of our software products and apps
contribute to the development of innovative solutions
Write production-grade product and platform code
Take responsibility for component technical designs and deliver quality code
Launch our Mobile Apps for both iOS and Android platforms
job_tasks.justification: These phrases directly relate to the creation, implementation, and delivery of software applications and systems, which is the core of traditional software development.

phrases: serving over 4m+ users across the globe
cater to the requirements of our expanding user community
empowers users to maximize the benefits derived from our products and services
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate an understanding of the user base, business needs, and the goal of delivering value to customers, which falls under business understanding.

phrases: interacting with our continuously evolving AI-powered platform
Our very own Generative AI tool
job_tasks.justification: While the job involves interacting with and developing around AI tools (Generative AI tool, AI Chatbot), it does not describe the core tasks of building, training, or fine-tuning these models themselves, which is the focus of TASK3.

phrases: ensuring that what you deliver is scalable, reliable, and secure
job_tasks.justification: This phrase touches upon operational concerns like scalability, reliability, and security, which are part of MLOps, but the description lacks the depth and specific tools associated with productionizing and maintaining AI models.

soft_skills.skill: Work with a strong agile mindset. Iterate fast and make data-driven decisions.
Promote feedback and knowledge sharing culture.
